### Canvas with deprecated props
<Canvas withSource="open" mdxSource={`
    <Canvas withSource="open" mdxSource={\`\`}>
      <Story name="Basic"/>
</Canvas>
`}>
  <Story name="Basic"/>
</Canvas>
